long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Golf Champions is available as a Chrome Extension, allowing you to easily access and play the game right from your browser. You can also play Golf Champions for free at the Classroom 6x website.

Golf Champions is a golf tournament game like no other! Your goal is to get the ball in the hole as few strokes as possible. Hit the ball with just the right amount of force. This is a game where both playing too safe and too risky will have consequences. Aim to get the highest score you can get & brag to all your friends about your digital golfing skills!

*Note: We have added "Classroom 6x, Poki Unblocked" button, making it easy for players to quickly access the games on our website https://classroom-6x.org, https://poki.ee
